profiledesc.creation:
Machine-readable finding aid derived from XML authoring program.
Date of source: May 2008
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid was prepared using DACS

titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Textile Collection, 1885 - ongoing
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Textile Collection, 1885 - [ongoing]
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The textile collection contains shirts, hats, commencement robes, sweaters, uniforms, and other apparel related to Wesleyan University.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Textile Collection, Collection #1000-5, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired from numerous donors. See Special Collections & Archives for details.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Thea deArmond, December 2006; University Archives staff, ongoing

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The textile collection contains shirts, hats, commencement robes, sweaters, uniforms, and other apparel related to Wesleyan University.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is not arranged. Items are added as they are acquired.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Textiles.

scopecontent.p: Belonged to George Lewis Mylchreest, class of 1907. Donated by Vorrey Mylchreest, August 2009.
